===Noun===

# [[occupation]]; [[profession]]; [[career]]; [[vocation]]
#: {{zh-x|職業 前景|'''career''' prospects}}

====Usage notes====
It is typical in Chinese to not distinguish between a profession and a professional title or role. Consider the following example:
:{{zh-x|他 的 職業 是 醫生。|He is a doctor by profession. (lit. "His profession is doctor.")}}
